de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm

Class TCPcommunicationLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.AbstractCommunicationLayer
      • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.TCPcommunicationLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommunicationLayer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPclientCommLayer, TCPserverCommLayer

    public abstract class TCPcommunicationLayer
extends AbstractCommunicationLayer
    Abstract bottom OSI layer for handling TCP/IP communication.
    Author:
    Marc Jakobi

    HTW Berlin

    July 2017
    See Also:
    FORTE communication architecture, Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean closeConnection()
      Closes this layer and calls closeConnection() on the layer below.
      boolean getConnectionState() 
      byte readByte()
      Reads a byte from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.
      double readDouble()
      Reads 8 bytes from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.
      float readFloat()
      Reads 4 bytes from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.

      Reads 4 bytes from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.

      Performs the necessary actions for receiving data.
